testcase.name: Add a new Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And click on customers Menu Item............................................passed And click on Add new button.................................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And click on save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Successfull Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on Log out link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
